requirements.name: Digital Signature Verification
requirements.description: The system shall support uploading and validating a doctor's digital signature image for every requisition.

requirements.name: Requisition Validation Rules
requirements.description: The system shall enforce all domain rules, such as not allowing multiple test types in a single requisition or preventing a doctor from prescribing to themselves.

requirements.name: Unified Test Duration
requirements.description: The duration of each test shall be consistent across all labs and managed by a centralized lab network configuration.

requirements.name: Repeat Pattern Enforcement
requirements.description: All tests on a repeated requisition must follow the same frequency and repetition count.

requirements.name: Test Mode Restriction
requirements.description: The system shall restrict tests to specific appointment modes, e.g., blood tests are walk-in only and cannot be scheduled.

requirements.name: Test Result Accessibility
requirements.description: Both doctors and patients shall have access to the test results and associated reports through the system.

requirements.name: Appointment Confirmation Integrity
requirements.description: Appointment confirmations must include a unique confirmation number, lab registration number, scheduled date and time, and lab details.

requirements.name: Cancellation Policy Enforcement
requirements.description: Appointments canceled or changed within 24 hours of the scheduled time shall trigger a fee, configurable by each lab.

requirements.name: Year-Round Lab Availability
requirements.description: All labs shall be operational 365 days a year without exceptions.

requirements.name: Consistent Lab Hours
requirements.description: A labâ€™s daily start and end time shall remain unchanged week-to-week with no mid-day breaks.

requirements.name: Create Requisition
requirements.description: The system shall allow doctors to create a new test requisition including required doctor and patient information.

requirements.name: Assign Tests to Requisition
requirements.description: The system shall allow adding one or more tests to a requisition, provided they belong to the same test group.

requirements.name: Configure Repeat Pattern
requirements.description: The system shall allow the doctor to specify repeat frequency and number of repetitions for all tests in a requisition.

requirements.name: View Test Results
requirements.description: The system shall allow doctors and patients to view the result and report of completed tests.

requirements.name: Book Appointment
requirements.description: The system shall allow patients to book an appointment based on lab availability, business hours, and test type.

requirements.name: UpdateAppointment
requirements.description: The system shall allow patients to cancel or reschedule an appointment, applying a fee if within 24 hours.

requirements.name: WalkInProcessing
requirements.description: The system shall support walk-in testing for tests not requiring appointments (e.g., blood tests).
